description:
Fire Emblem and Sky High win the King of the Buddy Heroes title. Barnaby gets some exciting news, but he has to keep it a secret.
Source: netflix

titles.title: March Winds and April Showers Bring Forth May Flowers.
March winds and April showers bring forth May flowers. 三月の風と四月の雨で五月の花が咲く
Sangatsu no Kaze to Shigatsu no Ame de Gogatsu no Hana ga Saku
